channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: My life partner is 18 years my senior. He wants to leave his $4.5 million fortune to me — not his two kids. Do we tell them?
item.description: “No doubt they would feel the arrangement is unfair, and that would potentially end our relationship.”

item.title: ‘I am getting very frustrated’: My mother’s adviser has not returned my calls. He manages $1 million. Is this normal?
item.description: “I am not used to this way of doing business.”

item.title: Why the government’s debt problem is your borrowing problem — but also your opportunity to save
item.description: People shopping for a car loan or a mortgage should understand the implications of high bond yields.

item.title: Tesla sales plunge in France, showing Elon Musk may have a long way to go to restore the brand
item.description: Tesla’s sales have been under pressure in Europe, even after the rollout of a souped-up Model Y.

item.title: This software stock can gain more than 50% after being held back by macroeconomic concerns, says BTIG
item.description: Shares have struggled in 2025, falling 2%, but have soared 88% over the past 12 months.

item.title: Josh Brown says he's not sure if Nike can ever turn it around
item.description: Brown believes that the iconic footwear brand isn't keeping up with the fierce competition with its celebrity spokespeople aging out of popularity.

item.title: Sports betting stocks slide after Illinois lawmakers approve tax hike
item.description: Shares of online sports betting platforms struggled in Monday's session.

item.title: As the world's population ages, these under-the-radar names could benefit
item.description: The aging population has implications for markets — but it isn't just health-care companies and senior living facilities that will benefit.
